Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation date: < 21.06.2001
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Removed external flag
28/29.04.2003 JJ SCR3420 replaced recalculation of STCY by sql
09.09.2002 JJ req JDO changed calculation of po.HashTotalBooked to net total
(i.e. including sign)
13.06.2002 JJ tst heller PPL -STCY validation simplified now only checks
amount debit - amount credit booked = amount debit - amount credit mentioned
- dropped now unused parameters
26.02.2002 JJ fixed bug in STCY validation, effectively only checked last STCY
Program (re)calculates and/or tests the STCY totals and the booked
hash total of a schedule from the corresponding invoice records (OSP).
Selection of testing or calculation only is by use of pi.Check:
T=Test, C=Calculate, Anything else = both
Only currencies with mentioned totals in STCY get booked, other
currencies will only show up in the hashtotal
26.02.2002 set all totals to true

SQL_STMT_U.val: select SCHI_INVCURRENCY, SCHI_INVERROR, cast(count(*) as decimal (9,0)), cast(sum(abs(sign(SCHI_INVAMOUNTI))) as decimal (9,0)), cast(sum(sign(SCHI_INVAMOUNTI)) as decimal (9,0)), cast(sum(SCHI_INVAMOUNTI) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (abs(SCHI_INVAMOUNTI)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' group by SCHI_INVCURRENCY, SCHI_INVERROR for fetch only

Text.val: caclulation number of debit (ND) / credit (NC) notes:
sum abs sign amount = ND + NC
sum sign amount = ND - NC
=> ND = (count + sum sign) / 2 and NC = count - ND
(note that count can not be used since this includes amount = 0)
Similar calculation of Amounts
sum amount = AD - AC
sum abs amount = AD + AC
= > AD = (sum amount + sum abs amount) / 2 and AC = sum abs amount - AD
